section.name: Expression results annotation step
section.p: This step allow to add additional annotations to expression files and create files in TSV, ODS or XLSX formats.

ul.li: Available: Both local and distributed mode

Input ports:
expressionfile: expression file in TSV format (format: expression_results_tsv)
additionalannotation: additional annotation file in TSV format (format: additional_annotation_tsv)

Output ports:
tsvoutput: expression file with additionnal annotation in TSV format if requested by user in the parameters of the step (format: annotated_expression_results_tsv)
odsoutput: expression file with additionnal annotation in ODS format if requested by user in the parameters of the step (format: annotated_expression_results_tsv)
xlsxoutput: expression file with additionnal annotation in XLSX format if requested by user in the parameters of the step (format: annotated_expression_results_tsv)

tr.td: One or more format name for the output separated by a comma.

ul.pre: <!-- Additional annotation for expression files --> <step skip="false"> <name>expressionresultsannotation</name> <parameters> <parameter> <name>outputformat</name> <value>xlsx,ods</value> </parameter> </parameters> </step>
